product_description: Sustainable industrial material in 5 beautiful colour families
recyclable_percentage_description: 100% Recyclable through Tarkett's Restart program. Materials granulated locally and shipped to Ronneby, Sweden for reprocessing into new iQ vinyl flooring.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Recyclable through ReStart - Contact your Tarkett representative.
recycled_content_description: Returnable through global ReStart program. Both installation waste and post-use.
recycling_process_description: This product is designed to be upcycled into new iQ vinyl flooring at the end of use through Tarkett's ReStart program.
reusable_description: 100% of post-use and installation offcuts can be used 8 times in the remanufacturing process with no loss of quality
end_of_life_program_description: ReStart. Locally materials returned to Gregory Hills, NSW. Architects to register projects with Tarkett representative.
minimisation_design_strategy: Engage Tarkett's ReStart program and insist on flooring contractors collecting and returning waste.
modern_slavery_action_plan_comment: UN Global Compact Early Adopter program
factory_finished_description: Surface treatment: New iQ PUR provides extreme durability as well as superior wear, stain and abrasion resistance for all heavy-traffic areas. No need for polish or wax, a simple dry-buffing is enough to restore this floor's original appearance.

recyclable_percentage_description: 100% Recyclable through Tarkett's Restart program. Materials granulated locally and shipped to Ronneby, Sweden for reprocessing into new iQ vinyl flooring.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Recyclable through ReStart - Contact your Tarkett representative.
recycled_content_description: Returnable through global ReStart program. Both installation waste and post-use.
recycling_process_description: This product is designed to be upcycled into new iQ vinyl flooring at the end of use through Tarkett's ReStart program.
reusable_description: 100% of post-use and installation offcuts can be used 8 times in the remanufacturing process with no loss of quality
end_of_life_program_description: ReStart. Locally materials returned to Gregory Hills, NSW. Architects to register projects with Tarkett representative.
minimisation_design_strategy: Engage Tarkett's ReStart program and insist on flooring contractors collecting and returning waste.
